frontmatter.title: Weather forecast with Python in 1 hour
frontmatter.description: free online programming course for Practicum

projectData.task: To develop an MVP of a new format of an educationl product for the top of the funnel to raise conversion rate into paid products.
projectData.whyExists: This was quite a challenge, for I was tasked to create an MVP in 3 weeks while not having a team yet. So, I teamed up with an LX designer and we thought through the entire learning experneince. We wrote and produced the entire course including texts, quizzes, images, Python tests quizzes and uploaded to our LMS.
